shortDescription: An issue was discovered on D-Link DIR-825 Rev.B 2.10 devices. They allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via the dns_query_name parameter in a dns_query.cgi POST request. TRENDnet TEW-632BRP 1.010B32 is also affected.
vulnerabilityName: D-Link DIR-825 R1 Devices Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
